wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Adrian Wright (born 12 December 1995) is a professional footballer who plays for Örebro in Allsvenskan. Born in England, Wright represents the Sierra Leone national team.

response: On 13 June, Chelsea announced it had released Marco Amelia and Kevin Wright, and also confirmed that loanees Radamel Falcao and Alexandre Pato would be returning to their respective teams. After spending a season-and-a-half on loan at Udinese, Udinese activated a clause in Stipe Perica's contract to sign him permanently.
